quote: The purpose of life is to realize the Self. That is the primary objective.
Remember God under all circumstances. Make your daily life a constant prayer.
There is an unbroken stream of bliss and its source is within you.
source: As The Flower Sheds Its Fragrance

quote: The mind is like a lake. When it is still, one can see to the bottom - one can realize the Self.
Whatever happens, happens for the best. Accept everything that comes as His will.
